channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PA

item.title: Report I-2025060199
item.description:
Report I-2025060199

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-06-10
  • City: HARRISBURG
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PILOT TRAVEL CENTERS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 263000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Vehicle owned by Pilot Travel Centers LLC (PTC) was exiting I-283 onto I-83N, when another vehicle made a sudden lane change from the left and struck the PTC tractor. The contact caused the PTC driver to lose control of the vehicle and the vehicle subsequently struck a gaurd rail and overturned. As a result, the trailer shell was breached and approximately 4000 gallons of diesel fuel were released. Video of event was captured by in-cab cameras equipped on PTC vehicle.
